section.title: sps-ig-smapp-0_dynamic.policy
section.codeblock: { "fea7e1e0-d24b-46eb-b40d-6ad8804a34a2_dynamic.policy": { "schedule": [], "192.168.3.12": { "group_level_backup_list": [], "backuplist": [ "/tmp/sdc_backup/", # Does not exist "/etc/fstab", # Does not exist "/etc/td-agent/plugin", # /etc/td-agent/plugin/ dir is empty "/etc/confd/conf.d/logrotate_conf", # /etc/confd does not exist "/etc/confd/templates/logrotate_conf", # /etc/confd does not exist "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/PCRFCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/ChargingCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/RSCustomRuleAttributeDictionary.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/vsa/*.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/rule/VsaToContextMapping.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/diameter/rule/ChargingVsaToContextMapping.xml", "/opt/tpa/conf/sac/TACData.dsv", "/appdata/LCM/sysdata/", # /appdata does not exist "/appdata/LCM/fstab" # /appdata does not exist ], "excludelist": [] } } }
